snippet: The arrest of Diana Durand, a friend of Representative Michael G. Grimm of Staten Island, suggests that the two-year-old investigation into his campaign financing is active.
abstract: Diana Durand, Texas woman who was a friend of, and fund-raiser for, Republican Rep Michael G Grimm of Staten Island, is charged with illegally funneling more than $10,000 into his 2010 campaign; Grimm has been at the center of a federal campaign finance investigation since at least early 2012.
lead_paragraph: The arrest of Diana Durand, a friend of Representative Michael G. Grimm of Staten Island, suggests that the two-year-old investigation into his campaign financing is active.
